# persistTimeout(_:)

**Instance Method**

Set the TCP persist timeout.

## Declaration

```swift
func persistTimeout(_ timeout: UInt32) -> TCP
```

## Parameters

- **timeout**: The persist timeout, in seconds.

## Discussion

The TCP persist timeout, in seconds (`PERSIST_TIMEOUT`). See RFC 6429.
title: persistTimeout(_:)
